sources.name: courses
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~>  courses

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared courses = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.BlobContents("https://cs110037ffe88b9a22a.blob.core.windows.net/demo/courses.csv"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  PromotedHeaders;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = courses,
  #"Removed duplicates" = Table.Distinct(Source, {"sourcedId", "orgSourcedId"})
in
  #"Removed duplicates";
